|chip2 = MediaTek;MT7663BSN; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = ''Win 10'' |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = Bluetooth 5.0 LE, WPA3, WMM, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = reference design |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/06/2020 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *WPA3-Enterprise, WPA3-Personal, WMM The full part of the ''[[MediaTek]]'' chip used in this device is: *MT7663BEN (PCIe 2.1) - NGFF (PCIe) version *MT7663BSN (SDIO 3.0) - NGFF (SDIO) version {{WiFiCert|WFA101328|09/26/2020}} :[https://api.cert.wi-fi.org/api/certificate/download/public?variantId=16719 WFA101328] (2020-09-26) ===Models=== *'''MediaTek MT7663BEN''' - 802.11ac WLAN/BT Combo Module - 14c3:7663 (PCIe) *'''MediaTek MT7663BSN''' - 802.11ac WLAN/BT Combo Module - 037a:7663 (SDIO) :SD\VID_037a&PID_7663&FN_1 - MT7663S (Wi-Fi) :SD\VID_037a&PID_7663&FN_2 - MT7663S (BT 5.0) *'''MediaTek MT7668S''' - 802.11abgn/ac WLAN/BT Combo Module - 037a:7668 ? (SDIO) :2T2R 802.11abgn/ac, SDIO 3.0/UART (BT), BT 5.0 LE *'''MediaTek MT7668U''' - 802.11abgn/ac WLAN/BT Combo Module - 0e8d:7668 (USB) :2T2R 802.11abgn/ac, USB 3.0/UART (BT), BT 5.0 LE *'''MediaTek MT7662E''' - 802.11ac Wireless Adapter - 14c3:7662 (PCIe) *'''MediaTek MT7633E''' - 802.11bgn Wi-Fi Adapter - 14c3:7633 (PCIe) :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7633&SUBSYS_197C103C - 103c:197c (HP) *[https://devid.info/209196/Mediatek+MT7630E+802.11bgn+Wi-Fi+Adapter '''MediaTek MT7630E''' - 802.11bgn Wi-Fi Adapter] - [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/14c3/7630 14c3:7630]
